    %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

    1 &

    7 \\

    %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

    0.02 & 
    3 & 
    0.3 \\
    %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

    %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
    Linear approx. $\etalin(\alpha)$ &
    0.0008 & 
    0.001 & 
    0.0008 \\
    %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
    % refit time for alpha
    %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
    Refits $\etaopt(\alpha)$ &
    0.5 & 
    30 & 
    5 \\

    % influence function
    %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

    0.09 & 
    3 &

    %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

    0.02 &

    0.4\\
    %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

    %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

    for $\phi$ &
    0.001 & 
    0.001 & 
    0.0008 \\
    %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

    %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

    0.6 &
